coding_practice.title: Array Partition
coding_practice.description: Given an integer array nums of 2n integers, group these integers into n pairs (a_1, b_1), (a_2, b_2), ..., (a_n, b_n) such that the sum of min(ai, bi) for all i is maximized. Return the maximized sum.

examples.explanation:
All possible pairings (ignoring the ordering of elements) are:
1. (1, 4), (2, 3) -> min(1, 4) + min(2, 3) = 1 + 2 = 3
2. (1, 3), (2, 4) -> min(1, 3) + min(2, 4) = 1 + 2 = 3
3. (1, 2), (3, 4) -> min(1, 2) + min(3, 4) = 1 + 3 = 4
So the maximum possible sum is 4.

coding_practice.explanation:
1. 將陣列 nums 排序。
2. 取排序後每一對相鄰元素的最小值，也就是 nums[0], nums[2], nums[4] ...。
3. 將這些元素相加即為最大化的 min(ai, bi) 和。
4. return sum(nums[::2]) 即可得到答案。
